Text: Gorontalo:  Historically it is well-known as a center of the spread of Islam in Eastern Indonesia.

Text: Gorontalo:  Gorontalo is mainly inhabited by several groups consisting of various Pohala'a (Family), among them Pohala'a Gorontalo (Ethnic Hulontalo), Pohala'a Suwawa (Ethnic Suwawa/Tuwawa), Pohala'a Limboto (Ethnic Limutu).
Triplets:<Pohala'a
8:
--------------------
Text: Gorontalo:  Pohala'a Bolango (Ethnic Bulango/Bolango) and Pohala'a Atinggola (Ethnic Atinggola) are also categorized into Gorontalo tribes (also known as Hulontalo, Gorontalese or Gorontaloan).
Triplets:<Gorontalo

--------------------
Text: Gorontalo:  It is believed that the spread of Gorantalese Diasphora has reached five times the current population in Gorontalo and are now scattered throughout Indonesia and other countries .
